class.name: RealSense
class.brief_description: RealSense is a node that allows you to capture depth data from a RealSense camera.
class.description: RealSense is a node that allows you to capture depth data from a RealSense camera.

method.name: get_depth_data
method.description: Returns the depth data as a PackedByteArray.

method.name: get_size
method.description: Returns the size of the depth data as a Vector2i.

method.name: initialize
method.description: Initializes the RealSense camera with the given width and height.

method.name: start_capturing
method.description: Starts capturing depth data from the RealSense camera.

method.name: stop_capturing
method.description: Stops capturing depth data from the RealSense camera.

signal.name: initialized
signal.description: Emitted when the RealSense camera is initialized.

signal.name: new_depth_data
signal.description: Emitted when new depth data is available.

signal.name: new_frame_ready
signal.description: Emitted when a new frame is ready.
